## How many citations do I have?


```{r}
library(scholar)
library(ggplot2)
library(SciencesPo)

# 'ZWO3CMQAAAAJ' is my google scholar id 
cit_df <- get_citation_history('ZWO3CMQAAAAJ')

date = format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z")

ggplot(cit_df,aes(x=year,y=cites)) + 
  geom_bar(stat='identity') +
  theme_bw() +
  xlab('Year') +
  ylab('Google Scholar Citations') + 
  annotate('text',
           label=date,
           x=-Inf, y=Inf, 
           vjust=1.7, hjust=-0.05,
           size=3,colour='gray') +
  geom_text(aes(label=cites), vjust=1.5, color="white", size=3) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 30)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=2010:2016) +
  ggtitle("h-index = 6\ni10-index = 5") +
  theme_pub()
```
